General.Name: SungEel HiTech Co. Ltd.
General.Description: SungEel HiTech Co., Ltd. operates as a secondary battery recycling company in South Korea. It recycles scrap and used batteries; and produces battery materials, such as nickel sulfate, cobalt sulfate, lithium carbonate, manganese sulfate, electrolytic nickel, electrolytic copper, and other materials from the battery powder. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Gunsan-si, South Korea.
